version_description:
We've made a ton of improvements:
- better HDR (now HDR+!) and improved Strobe mode
- UI improvements and enhanced performance for a smoother workflow
- fixed minor bugs & crashes
- more help assets

This update we've added:
- 5 new preset packs! Check out Bright, Drama, Faded, HighCon and LowCon.
- HDR+ mode improvements
- full compatibility with iOS 11
- better performance on iPhone 6/6+
- bug fixes

User feedback is super impor

What's new:
- fixed saved presets deletion on iOS 11.
- fixed export to iCloud Photo Sharing.
- added flash control on Quickshot mode.
- improved performance.

User feedback is super important to us. Get in touch (quickshot.support@light

What has changed?? What hasn't?!?
- Introducing Primers: Intense, bold, image enhancing deep filters fine-tuned for adventure junkies who live life in full color.
- Sky Control: Transform the sky in seconds! Chose from a mix of skies covering brea

What has changed?? What hasn't?!? Here are some key features:
- Introducing Primers: Intense, bold, image enhancing deep filters fine-tuned for adventure junkies who live life in full color. These Primers will transform any landscape photo to a poster

- Improved Sky feature.
- Added grain tool (in Details).
- Bug fixes and improved performance.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our help with any issues, please contact us at quickshot.support@lightricks.com.
~ Quickshot Team ~

By popular demand, we've added more overlays:
- New Year Overlays Pack! Celebrate the year of the pig with these festive Overlays.
- More lens flares!
Additionally, we fixed some bugs.

We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our he

— Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our help with any issues, please contact us at quickshot.support@lightricks.com.
~ Quickshot Team ~
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Due to popular demand, we have added localization!

What's new?
- As requested from our users: the app is now iPad supported!!
- Full app localization.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
This version is a hotfix for a bug which caused the app to freeze when loading photos on certain devices.

After all the love and positive feedback we got for our Sky feature, we decided to give some love back to the users:
We took our Sky tool to a whole new level! From sunny skies to dreamy sunsets and beautiful nights, we give you the ultimate tool to gi
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We are excited to introduce our new "Portrait" feature! Now you can create professional looking portraits with a single tap.
Continuing the Quickshot tradition, this feature is:
A) Super easy to use.
B) Creates stunning results in a heart beat.
bug fixes and performance improvements.
Added a new screen that describes our weekly facebook challenge and offers the user to enter the challenge.

Following the success of the "Quickshot weekly challenge" on Facebook, we have added the weekly challenge to Instagram as well!
We hope you enjoy!

Quickshot Team.

Introducing a new package of skies: "Ablaze".
Set your skies on fire with this brand new package!

Our #1 requested feature: Brushes!
Use the new Brush and Eraser with the automatic Sky and Portrait features for even better results.
That's right, now you can adjust the Sky and Portrait effects with ease and get a perfect match in every photo!
Stop offering a subscription with a trial period.
This version contains different bug fixes.
Added Christmas sky assets.

A brand new feature (!!): Looks.
Looks are combinations of Quickshot tools, specially crafted by our design team.
With looks you can combine the power of all our tools in a single tap.
Each look is completely different, to allow you a wide range

As usual, making Quickshot even faster & easier by shooing those bugs away and making the app (even) friendlier. Done using a tool? Tap the checkmark to stick to your edits, or the X to try something else.

Hey Quickshoters,
Excited about Fall? What better way to celebrate the season changing than with new skies to match the beautiful changing leaves!
With this update we've brought you:
- 12 new Skies
- 24 awesome new Effects
Enjoy the season!
